definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: MeiXianZu helpless under can only use fan medicine fan pour WangXiaoGong.
sentences.chinese: 梅贤祖无奈之下只能用迷药迷倒王小红。

sentences.english: The contents of the images extend like hallucinogen.
sentences.chinese: 图象的内容如迷药般蔓延，将它们作成内透式灯箱。

sentences.english: In Dan’s van, Kimberly realizes that Janet has been drugged.
sentences.chinese: 在丹的小货车里，金伯利意识到珍妮特被下了迷药。

definition: a kind of sleeping gas or smoke used by thieves to incapacitate victims
to bewitch/to enchant/to cast a spell over sb
to knock sb out with a drug/to render sb unconscious
to prescribe medicine/to poison/to slip a drug (into sb's drink etc)
to put poison in sth/to poison
to promote estrus/to bring an animal to heat by artificial means
